summary: MY IGNITION LOCKED UP AND LEFT ME STRANDED FOR A FEW HOURS.  I COULD BARELY PUT THE KEY IN, AND WHEN I DID GET IT IN, IT WOULD NOT TURN.  IT CAUSED ME TO MISS 4 HOURS OF WORK.  I CALLED A FORD SERVICE TECHNICIAN, AND HE TOLD ME THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THE FOCUS.  HOW COME THERE IS NOT A RECALL.  I HAVE RESEARCHED THE ISSUE, AND IT SEEMS LIKE EVERYONE THAT OWNS A FORD FOCUS, HAS HAD THIS ISSUE HAPPEN TO THEM. *JB
